resources.string: In this tutorial you will learn the basics about switches
This is the fifth tutorial. Here you will learn how to interact with switches.
As you can see, the wall is too high for jumping over it. But there is a switch that will help you. Walk to it!
Press [colour='FFFFFFFF'][image='input_buttons/activate'][colour='FF000000'] to activate the switch. This will have effects on the map, like creating or removing blocks, objects, ...
This is a timed switch. After activation you have only limited time until the switch is reset. You can of course use the switch several times if you are not fast enough in your first approach.
This switch can be deactivated again, this will help you to proceed.
